      • createQuad

        public static GVRMesh createQuad(GVRContext gvrContext,
                                 float width,
                                 float height)
        Creates a quad consisting of two triangles, with the specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        width - the quad's width
        height - the quad's height
        Returns:

      • createRoundQuad

        public static GVRMesh createRoundQuad(GVRContext gvrContext,
                                      float width,
                                      float height,
                                      float rx,
                                      float ry,
                                      int segments)
        Creates a rounded quad with the specified width and height.
        Parameters:
        gvrContext - current GVRContext
        width - The quad's width
        height - The quad's height
        rx - Ratio for x-axis.
        ry - Ration for y-axis.
        segments - Number of segments for the corner.
        Returns:
        A 2D, rounded quad.
